Question.txt: You can help me with coconuts.
Question.reply: I will help you save your farm.

Conversation.Response: This is my coconut farm but it has been overrun by Dread Robert monkey. He is ruining my coconut farm.
Yeah I have some coconuts left.
Yeah I saw Yimo not that long ago. She was heading up towards the temple door.

Question.txt: She thinks the myth of a gem is inside. Not many people know how to get there.

Game.wingame: Yay, my coconuts have been saved. Here have 10 coconuts as a reward. I would give more but I only have a few left.
Game.failgame: Oh no I lost my coconuts.
